F_P_1: Pakubadwa mwana kumayamba pamene mkazi amaliza kugona ndi mwamuna wake ndipo mwamuna amaliza kugona ndi mkazi wake.
F_P_2: Pakuyambira kwa sabatali, mwana wanu amayamba kukula. Mwana wanu amalizidwa masiku 12 mpaka 24 ngati mkazi wanu akugonana ndi mwamuna wake. M'masiku otsatira, mwana wanu (wotchedwa zygote) adzayamba kugawika m'magulu osiyanasiyana pomwe ukupita kuchipatala, kulowa m'mimba mwanu, ndikuyamba kulowa m'mimba mwanu.
F_P_3: Mwana wanu tsopano ndi woyenera kudziwika. Tsopano muli pafupi ndi masabata 4 kuyambira tsiku lomaliza la sabata yanu.
F_P_4: Tsopano kuyambira ndi nkhope yake ndi khosi. Mtima ndi misempha zikupitilira kukula. Mapapu, m'mimba ndi chiwindi zikuyamba kukulanso.
F_P_5: Ndi nthawi imeneyi - pamene sabata yanu ina ingakhale yoyenera - mungathe kupeza zotsatira zabwino pa mayeso a pakubadwa mwana.
F_P_6: Amayesa pafupifupi 5cm ndipo amayamba kuchita zinthu mwamphamvu. Kukaniza kwa mtima mwana kumamveka koma ndi chida chachizungu.
F_P_7: Sabatali mwana wanu amayamba kuchita zinthu mwamphamvu: Zala zake zidzayamba kutseguka ndi kutsogolera, zala za m'mphepete mwa khosi zidzagwedeza, ndipo pakamwa pake pachitapo zinthu zokhala ndi mphamvu.
F_P_8: Maso a mwana amatha kuwala ndipo mtima ndi misempha zonse zili bwino. Kuyambira pakhosi la mwana wanu kumayamba, koma tsitsi lake silikuwoneka pano.
F_P_9: Miili yake yakhala yokula kwambiri, mutu wake wakhala wokwera kwambiri, ndipo makutu ake ali pafupi ndi malo ake omaliza. Zala za mwana wanu ndi za m'mphepete mwa khosi zili ndi zilembo za zala. Mwana wanu tsopano amayesa pafupifupi 11-12cm ndipo amalemera pafupifupi 100 gramu.
F_P_10: Pamwamba pa mimba yanu (m'mimba) tsopano ndi 7.8cm pansi pa m'mimba mwanu.
F_P_11: Onjezani nyama, nsomba, nyemba kapena ma egg ndi nsima yanu kapena stew kuti mupeze mphamvu ya mwana wanu.
F_P_12: Onjezani tsiku lililonse chimanga ndi masamba abwino, nzungu ndizabwino, chepetsani mchere m'chakudya chanu.
F_P_13: Muyenera kukhala ndi nthenda zochepa tsopano. Ngati nthenda zikupitilira, nena kwa wothandizira pa chipatala cha pakubadwa mwana
F_P_15: Kulemera kwake ndi 500-600 gramu tsopano. Amayankha mawu mwa kuyenda kapena kukaniza kwa mtima kwake mwamsanga. Ngati mumva kugwedezeka amakhala ndi hiccups. Mwana wanu angamve kuti ali pansi m'mimba. Amamva mizika, mawu anu, kuyenda kwanu, kumva manja anu pamene mumugwira.
F_P_16: Mwana wanu akukula kwambiri ndipo akhala ndi thupi lofewa, koma nthawi zokhala ndi thupi lokhazikika zikubwera.
F_P_14: Amayesa pafupifupi 5cm ndipo amayamba kuchita zinthu mwamphamvu. Kukaniza kwa mtima mwana kumamveka koma ndi chida chachizungu.
F_P_17: Mwana ndi wa 35cm kutali ndipo amalemera kilo imodzi. Akuyenda ndi kukankha kwambiri tsopano. Akusewera ngati kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana kunayamba msanga, mwana wanu angapulumuke koma ndizabwino kwambiri kuti akhale mkati mwa masabata 10!.
F_P_18: Maso a mwana wanu akukula, zomwe zingathe kuwonetsa kuwala kochokera kunja. Amatha kuwala, ndipo zilembo za maso ake zakhala zikukula.
F_P_19: Funsani dokotala wanu za zizindikiro za kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana msanga. Onaninso ndondomeko yanu ya pakubadwa mwana ndipo konzekerani nokha pakubadwa mwana, phunzirani zidandaulo ndi zizindikiro, ndi mmene kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana kumayambira.
F_P_20: Mwana wanu amalemera pafupifupi 2kgs tsopano ndipo akuyenda kwambiri. Zilembo za thupi zimatha kuchitika pomwe mafuta amayamba kukula pansi pa thupi. Pakati pano ndi pakubadwa kwake, mwana wanu adzawonjezera pakati pa kilo imodzi mpaka ziwiri.
F_P_21: Mwinamwake mukulemera pafupifupi paundi imodzi pachisawawa tsopano. Theka la izo limapita mwamsanga kwa mwana wanu, yemwe adzawonjezera theka la kulemera kwake pakubadwa m'masabata asanu ndi awiri kukonzekera kwa moyo kunja kwa mimba.
F_P_22: Ana amasiyana m'mitundu, Anyamata amakhala akulu kuposa akazi, mapasa ndi ang'ono kuposa amodzi, makolo ake ndi akulu kapena ang'ono.
F_P_23: Ngati mwana wanu ndi wang'ono koma akukula mwamphamvu ndizabwino. Pa nthawiyi ali pafupi ndi 47cm ndipo amalemera pafupi ndi 2,7kg. Ubongo ndi mapapu zili pafupi ndi kumaliza.
F_P_24: Mutu ukunangika pansi pano, kukonzekera pakubadwa mwana. Kubadwa pakati pa masabata 37-42 ndikobwino kwambiri.
F_P_25: Aliyense! Tsiku lobadwa mwana loyenera kukula kwathunthu limaloledwa kwa masabata 40 a pakubadwa mwana, koma kubadwa kwathunthu kungakhale kuyambira sabata 38 mpaka 42.
F_P_26: Ngati kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana sikunayambe mwadzidzidzi pa sabata 42, kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana kungayambitsidwe ndi wothandizira pazachipatala pazifukwa za chitetezo cha mwana ndi chanu.
F_P_27: Ngati mwadutsa tsiku lanu lobadwa mwana, mungakhale osadutsa momwe mukuganizira, makamaka ngati munalembetsa tsiku lomaliza la sabata yanu. Nthawi zina akazi amaliza kugonana posachedwa kuposa momwe amayembekezera.
F_P_6: Amayesa pafupifupi 5cm ndipo amayamba kuchita zinthu mwamphamvu. Kukaniza kwa mtima mwana kumamveka koma ndi chida chachizungu.

YOU_FIRST: Kuyambira poyamba, mowa, kusuta ndi mankhwala (kuphatikiza tiyi wa malamulo) angawononge kwambiri thanzi la mwana wanu.
YOU_SECOND: Ichi ndichifukwa chake ndikofunikira kudziwa ngati mukuyembekezera mwana ndikupeza malangizo ndi thandizo kuchokera kwa othandizira thanzi oyenerera.
YOU_THIRD: Mwezi umodzi, mabele anu angakhale otentha ndi kukula kale. Mumamva kuvomereza nthawi zambiri? M'masabata angapo zidzatha
YOU_FOURTH: Kumwa tiyi wofewa ndi kudya zokha zokha zokhala ndi nthawi yochepa, osati zokhala ndi mafuta ambiri, sagary kapena mchere, zidzachepetsa nthenda.
YOU_FIFTH: Pazifukwa za thanzi la mwana wanu, musamwe mowa, musagwiritse ntchito tiyi wa malamulo kapena kusuta kapena kugwiritsa ntchito mankhwala. Idyani chakudya chabwino.
YOU_SIXTH: Pazifukwa za thanzi la mwana wanu, musamwe mowa, musagwiritse ntchito tiyi wa malamulo kapena kusuta kapena kugwiritsa ntchito mankhwala. Idyani chakudya chabwino.

BABY_MOVEMENT: Kusamala kwa mwana kwadziwika. Itanani wothandizira thanzi mwamsanga ndipo konzekerani kupita kuchipatala.
IMPORTANT_1: ZOFUNIKA: Moyo wanu ndi wa mwana wanu angafunike kuchita mwamsanga!
BLEEDING_1: Ngati mukugwedezeka kwambiri kuchokera kwa mkazi, musayembekezere - itanani ambulansi poyamba!
BLEEDING_2: Ngati mukugwedezeka kwambiri kuchokera kwa mkazi, musayembekezere - itanani ambulansi poyamba!
BLEEDING_DESCRIPTION_1: M'masabata oyamba, kugwedezeka kofewa kungakhale kofanana, koma kugwedezeka kwambiri nthawi zonse ndi mavuto.
VAGINA_QUESTION_2: Kutayika kwa madzi ofanana ndi madzi kuchokera kwa mkazi?
VAGINA_QUESTION_5: Kutayika kwa madzi ofanana ndi madzi kuchokera kwa mkazi?

VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_1: Kutuluka kununkhira, kofiira kumasonyeza matenda omwe ayenera kuchiritsidwa.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_2: Izi zimachokera kwa sac ya amniotic momwe mwana amakhala.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_3: Pewani fumbi ndi utsi. Phimbani pakamwa ndi mphuno ndi chikopa kunja.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_4: Yesetsani kukumbukira ngati munadya chimene chinayambitsa kapena munali ndi wina wodwala..
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_6: Pambuyo pa sabata 24, tengani nthawi yochepa tsiku lililonse kuti mumve ngati mwana akuyenda. Pambuyo pa sabata 32, kulephera kuyenda mwadzidzidzi kumafuna kuyang'aniridwa.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_7: Nenani kwa wina wokhulupirika amene angathandize kulemba uthenga ngati mukufuna.

HEALTH_QUESTION_8: Kodi mumatuluka mwamsanga pochita ntchito zofanana?
HEALTH_QUESTION_9: Kodi mwakhala ndi mtima kuwala nthawi zambiri kuyambira pamene munabadwa mwana?
HEALTH_QUESTION_10: Kodi muli ndi mtima kuwala lero?
HEALTH_QUESTION_11: Kodi mwakhala ndi kuwala kwa thupi kuyambira pamene munabadwa mwana?
HEALTH_QUESTION_15: Kodi mwapanga ndondomeko ya pakubadwa mwana ndi mavuto?
HEALTH_QUESTION_16: Kodi mukuwona miili yotupa m'miili yanu, m'manja, kapena nkhope?
HEALTH_QUESTION_17: Kodi mukuwona kukaniza kwa pakubadwa mwana kapena kukhwima kwa mimba?
HEALTH_QUESTION_18: Kodi mwaphika chikwama chanu cha chipatala?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_1: Pamene mukubadwa mwana, kuwala kulikonse kwa thupi kuyenera kuyang'aniridwa kuti kusawononge mwana wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_2: Zabwino kuti mumamva bwino! Pitilizani kuyang'anira zosintha zilizonse.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_3: Chonde yang'anirani zizindikiro zanu mwamphamvu. Ngati zochitika zanu zasokonezeka, funsani wothandizira thanzi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_4: Ngati mukupitiriza kumva mosasamala, chonde funsani wothandizira thanzi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_5: Kusokonezeka kwa pakubadwa mwana ndikofanana, koma ngati ndikokhazikika, ganizirani kukambirana ndi dokotala wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_6: Zabwino kumva! Ngati mukuyamba kumva kusokonezeka, yang'anani nthawi ndi nthawi zomwe zimatenga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_7: Ngati kusokonezeka kukupitiriza, zikulimbikitsidwa kuti mufunse malangizo kuchokera kwa wothandizira thanzi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_8: Kulephera ndikofanana, koma onetsetsani kuti mukupumula bwino. Ngati zikukhala zovuta kwambiri, funsani dokotala wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_9: Kusunga mphamvu ndizabwino! Pitilizani kugwira ntchito yanu yamakono ndikusintha ngati mukufuna.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_10: Ngati kulephera kukupitirira mwamphamvu, ganizirani kusintha njira zanu kapena kukambirana ndi dokotala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_11: Kusintha kwa hormonal kungayambitse kusintha kwa mawu. Ngati zikukhudza moyo wanu, ganizirani kufunsa malangizo kapena kufunsa dokotala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_12: Kusunga mawu okhazikika ndikabwino! Pitilizani kuchita zinthu zomwe zimalimbikitsa moyo wabwino.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_13: Ngati kusintha kwa mawu kukupitiriza, njira zopumula kapena kukambirana ndi wamaluso zingathandize.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_14: Kufuna ndi kulephera ndizofanana. Onetsetsani kuti chakudya chanu chikupitilira kukhala chabwino ndipo funsani dokotala wanu ngati mukuwopa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_15: Chakudya chabwino ndichofunika pakati pa pakubadwa mwana. Pitilizani kugwiritsa ntchito mankhwala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_16: Ngati kufuna kapena kulephera kwanu kukupitiriza, yang'anirani kuti mukudya bwino.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_17: Kuvomereza kum'mawa ndikofanana pakati pa pakubadwa mwana, koma ngati ndikokhazikika kapena kukupitiriza, funsani wothandizira thanzi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_18: Zabwino kuti simumva kuvomereza. Pitilizani kuyang'anira zosintha.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_19: Ngati kuvomereza kukupitiriza, yesetsani kudya zokha zokha, zokhala ndi nthawi yochepa ndipo funsani dokotala wanu ngati n'kofunikira.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_20: Kugona bwino ndikofunikira. Pitilizani kugona bwino.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_21: Yesetsani kukonza malo anu ogona ndi njira zanu. Ngati kulephera kugona kukupitiriza, funsani wothandizira thanzi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_22: Ngati mavuto ogona akupitiriza, ganizirani kusintha njira zanu kapena kufunsa malangizo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_23: Kusokonezeka ndi kusokonezeka ndikofanana koma ayenera kusamalidwa. Ganizirani njira zopumula kapena kukambirana ndi wamaluso.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_24: Kusunga mtima wokhazikika ndikabwino! Pitilizani kugwiritsa ntchito njira zopumula.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_25: Ngati kusokonezeka kapena kusokonezeka kukupitiriza, ganizirani kukambirana ndi wamaluso.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_26: Kuyenda kwa mwana nthawi zonse ndizizindikiro zabwino. Pitilizani kuyang'anira ndikulemba zosintha.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_27: Kusowa kwa kuyenda kungakhale kovuta. Chonde lumikizanani ndi wothandizira thanzi mwamsanga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_28: Ngati mukupitiriza kuona kuyenda kochepa, ndikofunikira kufunsa malangizo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_29: Ndikofunikira kukambirana ndi wothandizira thanzi za mavuto aliwonse. Kuyambira koyamba ndikofunikira.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_30: Zabwino kuti mumva kukhala ndi chiyembekezo cha pakubadwa mwana. Pitilizani kuyang'anira momwe mumamvira.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_31: Ngati mukupitiriza kukhala ndi mavuto omweyo, musazengereze kukambirana ndi wothandizira thanzi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_32: Kuyambira poyamba, mowa, kusuta ndi mankhwala (kuphatikiza tiyi wa malamulo) angawononge kwambiri thanzi la mwana wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_33: Ichi ndichifukwa chake ndikofunikira kudziwa ngati mukuyembekezera mwana ndikupeza malangizo ndi thandizo kuchokera kwa othandizira thanzi oyenerera.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_34: Mwezi umodzi, mabele anu angakhale otentha ndi kukula kale. Mumamva kuvomereza nthawi zambiri? M'masabata angapo zidzatha
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_35: Kumwa tiyi wofewa ndi kudya zokha zokha zokhala ndi nthawi yochepa, osati zokhala ndi mafuta ambiri, sagary kapena mchere, zidzachepetsa nthenda
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_36: Pazifukwa za thanzi la mwana wanu, musamwe mowa, musagwiritse ntchito tiyi wa malamulo kapena kusuta kapena kugwiritsa ntchito mankhwala. Idyani chakudya chabwino.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_37: Pa masabata 8-11, palibe chomwe mungawone koma mungamve kutopa ndi kuvomereza makamaka m'mawa. Zidzatha m'masabata angapo
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_38: Kumwa tiyi wofewa ndi kudya zokha zokha zosakhala ndi mafuta ndi mchere wambiri kumathandiza
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_39: Ngati mukupitiriza kumva kuvomereza nthawi zambiri pambuyo pa sabata 12, nena kwa wothandizira thanzi. Funsani mnzako kuti akubweretse. Ayeneranso kuyesedwa kuti alibe matenda
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_40: Mwadana sabata yanu yachiwiri? Mukupitiriza kumva kuvomereza ndipo mabele anu amamva kukhala ndi kanthu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_41: Mungakhale mwaona, ena ang'ono, koma ndizabwino kupita kuchipatala cha ANC tsopano kuti mupeze chiyambi chabwino cha pakubadwa mwana ndi kuyang'anira matenda, malangizo ndi mankhwala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_42: Ndipo, ngati n'kofunikira mankhwala, kuti mukhale ndi mwana wanu mwamtendere ndi thanzi. Funsani mnzako kuti akubweretse.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_43: Onjezani nyama, nsomba, nyemba kapena ma egg ndi nsima yanu kapena stew kuti mupeze mphamvu ya mwana wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_44: Onjezani tsiku lililonse chimanga ndi masamba abwino, nzungu ndizabwino, chepetsani mchere m'chakudya chanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_45: Muyenera kukhala ndi nthenda zochepa tsopano. Ngati nthenda zikupitilira, nena kwa wothandizira pa chipatala cha pakubadwa mwana
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_46: Pa sabata 20-23, muyenera kuyamba kumva mwana akukankha ndi kuyenda ngati mukukhala chete.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_47: Zikadali 18 - 20 masabata asanafike kuti mwana abadwe, koma zinthu zingachitike zomwe zimapangitsa kuti afune kubwera msanga, kotero konzekerani
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_48: Pamene mupita kuchipatala cha ANC, pitani ndi mwamuna wanu kapena wina wokhulupirika ndikukambirana ndondomeko yanu ya pakubadwa mwana ndi mavuto ndi othandizira pa chipatala
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_49: Ameneyu ndi amayi yemwe ali ndi masabata 24 (miyezi 7) yobadwa mwana. Akung'ambika ndi thanzi. Akudya chakudya chabwino, akuchita zochita zofewa, akupumula pang'ono koma osati zambiri.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_50: Tsopano mwana adzayamba kukula mwamsanga, kotero idyani zambiri za protein (nsomba, ma egg, nyama, mkaka ndi masamba abwino ndi zomera zonse za nthawi yake). Chitani mosamala, mwana wanu angadziwike msanga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_51: Miyezi itatu kapena zochepera zotsala kuti mwana abadwe, kodi ndondomeko yanu ya pakubadwa mwana yakonzeka?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_52: Mimba yanu iyenera kukula mwamsanga tsopano ndipo mabele akukula ndipo akukhala otentha kwambiri kukonzekera kuyamwitsa
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_53: Gwirani masana. Khalani ndi mphamvu koma osagwira ntchito zolimba kapena kulima
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_54: Mimba yanu yakhala yayikulu kwambiri tsopano ndipo idzapita kwambiri pomwe mwana wanu akulemera 1 mpaka 2 kg
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_55: Madzi ofiira angatuluke kuchokera kwa mabele anu. Izi zimatchedwa colostrum, ndipo zimachitika kukonzekera mabele anu kupanga mkaka
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_56: Ngati mungathe kupita kuchipatala cha ANC sabata iliyonse pa nthawiyi ya pakubadwa mwana ngati simungathe kupita, lumikizanani ndi wothandizira thanzi kudzera pa JamboMama
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_57: Pakubadwa mwana kwanu tsopano ndi pafupi ndi masabata 36: kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana kwafika! Ndondomeko ya pakubadwa mwana yakonzeka? Wokhulupirika wakonzeka? Zonse zili bwino? Pitani kundondomeko yanu ya pakubadwa mwana kawiri!
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_58: Malangizo: Pamene mukulemera kwambiri ndizabwino kwambiri kugona pamutu kumanzere kuti muyike oxygen ndi magazi kuyenda kwa mwana wanu
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_60: ngati mwana wanu sanakubwerereno, konzekerani kupita kuchipatala nthawi iliyonse. Onetsetsani kuti mwana wanu akuyenda ndi kugona ndi kupumula pamutu kumanzere. Ngati zidutsa masabata 40 ndipo palibe chomwe chikuchitika, itanani RHP yanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_61: Miyezi itatu kapena zochepera zotsala kuti mwana abadwe, kodi ndondomeko yanu ya pakubadwa mwana yakonzeka?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_62: Muyenera kuyang'aniridwa kwambiri. Ngati pakubadwa mwana sikunayambe mwadzidzidzi ndi sabata 42, kukaniza (malwiro a pakubadwa mwana) kungayambitsidwe.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_63: Mwana wanu wabadwa! Zabwino zonse! Munapita kuchipatala nthawi yake.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_64: Pumulani bwino, yamwitsani mwana wanu ndipo khalani ndi ulalo ndi wothandizira thanzi!. Masiku 10 oyamba ndi okhala ndi mavuto kwambiri. Yang'anirani zizindikirozi pazifukwa zanu. Kuwala kwa thupi, kugwedezeka, kapena kutuluka kununkhira kuchokera kwa mkazi, kugwedezeka.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_65: Mwana wanu: kuwala kwa thupi, kugwedezeka, kulephera kupuma, kulephera kuyenda, kulephera kuyamwa. Itanani thandizo lachipatala mwamsanga pamene mukuwopa chilichonse!
ANY_OTHER_QUESTION_1: Fotokozani mavuto ena omwe muli nawo...
THANK_YOU_1: Zikomo Amayi! RHP yanu idzawerenga izi ndikukulankhulana ngati n'kofunikira. Ngati zizindikiro zasokonezeka, itanani wothandizira thanzi kapena chipatala choyandikana. Fomu yachotsedwa kuti mugwiritse ntchito mtsogolo
LOADING_USER_DATA: Chonde dikirani, ikulodza zambiri za wogwiritsa...

Kulephera kusunga kafukufuku. Chonde yang'anani ulalo wanu ndikuyesanso. '

ERROR_12: Palibe mayankho kuchokera kwa mgwirizano pano
ERROR_17: Mulibe wothandizira pazachipatala wolumikizidwa kukamba naye
APPLICATION_SENT: Pempho lanu latumizidwa kudoko lathu la admin.\n Tidzakubweretsani zotsatira posachedwa.
NO_HEALTH_FACILITIES: Palibe malo othandizira thanzi omwe alipo.
CRITICAL_VAGINA: ZOFUNIKA KWAMBIRI: Kugwedezeka kwambiri kwa mkazi kudalikiridwa
URGENT_VAGINA: ZOFUNIKA KWAMBIRI: Mgwirizano anena kuti mwana wayima kuyenda
URGENT_VAGINA_2: ZOFUNIKA KWAMBIRI: Kukaniza kwa pakubadwa mwana kovuta

HOW_LONG_TRIP: Kodi ulendo umenewu umatenga nthawi yayitali bwanji?
STAY_AFTER_BIRTH: Kodi adzakhala nanu mpaka pambuyo pakubadwa mwana?

Kodi ulendo umenewu umatenga nthawi yayitali bwanji?
WHAT_BLOOD_GROUP: Kodi mtundu wake wa magazi ndi uti?
GIVE_BLOOD: Kodi ndani angapange magazi ngati mukufuna?
W_H_P: Kodi ndani wothandizira pazachipatala adzathandizira pakubadwa mwana?
NAME_CONTACT_TAXI: Dzina ndi zambiri za wotenga galimoto kapena wokhulupirika:
SAVE_TFARE: Ngati muyenera kulipira ulendo, yambani kusunga tsopano!
SESSION_HC: Kukambirana kwanu ndi wothandizira pazachipatala kwatha chifukwa cha chitetezo.
V_HEALTH_CARE: Chonde tsimikizirani kuti wothandizira pazachipatala ali pano kuti mupitilize.
IMPORTANT_M_I: Fomuyi ili ndi zambiri zachipatala zomwe ziyenera kulembetsedwa ndi thandizo la dokotala woyenerera.
HEALTHCARE_PROVIDER: Chonde tsimikizirani kuti wothandizira pazachipatala ali pano kuti akuthandizeni ndi fomuyi.
ASK_VERIFICATION_CODE: Chonde funsani wothandizira pazachipatala kuti alowetse code yake yotsimikizira:
VERIFIED_PRESENT: Wothandizira pazachipatala wotsimikiziridwa ayenera kukhala pano kuti atumize fomuyi.
V_PROVIDER: Chonde tsimikizirani wothandizira pazachipatala kuti mumalize fomuyi
P_E_PH: Chonde lowetsani nambala ya foni ya ogwirizana
P_S_BT: Chonde sankhani mtundu wanu wa magazi
N_V_I: Palibe zofunika zomwe zilipo kwa mgwirizano uwu
YOUR_OVER_ALL_WELL: Kumva bwino kwathunthu kwanu ndikofunikira kwa inu ndi mwana wanu.
S_O_B_N: Kutuluka mwamsanga kungakhale kofanana pakati pa pakubadwa mwana koma kuyenera kuyang'aniridwa.
F_D_P_E: Mtima kuwala nthawi zambiri pakati pa pakubadwa mwana kuyenera kuyang'aniridwa.
C_H_S_U: Kuwala kwa mtima pano kumathandiza kudziwa zofunikira.
F_DP_B: Kuwala kwa thupi pakati pa pakubadwa mwana kumafuna chithandizo chachipatala kuti muteteze mwana wanu.
M_SICKNESS_C: Kuvomereza kum'mawa ndikofanana pakati pa pakubadwa mwana koma kungachitike nthawi zonse.
G_B_H: Kugona bwino ndikofunikira pazachipatala zanu ndi kukula kwa mwana wanu.
B_M_G: Kuyenda kwa mwana ndizizindikiro zabwino za thanzi la mwana wanu.
P_AHEAD: Kukonzekera kutsogolo kumathandiza kuti mubadwe mwana mwamtendere kwa inu ndi mwana wanu.
SWELLING_NORMAL: Kutupa kungakhale kofanana koma kungasonyeze mavuto monga pre-eclampsia.
C_37: Kukaniza kwa pakubadwa mwana musanafike masabata 37 kungasonyeze kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana msanga.
B_P_DE: Kukonzekera kubadwa mwana kumathandiza kuchepetsa kusokonezeka pamene kuyamba kwa pakubadwa mwana kumayamba.
A_O_Q: Kodi muli ndi funso lina kapena vuto lililonse?
F_F_C_H: Khalani omasuka kugawana mavuto aliwonse - wothandizira thanzi wanu ali pano kuti akuthandizeni.
T_U_C: Tiuzeni za mavuto ena omwe muli nawo...
T_M_I: Zikomo Amayi! Wothandizira thanzi wanu adzawerenga izi ndikukulankhulana ngati n'kofunikira.
CALL_CHW: Letsani CHW yanu kudziwa momwe mumamvira.
D_P_NEXT: Kambiranani izi ndi wopereka pano pamene mupita kuchipatala.
A_S_T: Funsani wina kuti ayang'anire kutentha kwanu.
IT_WILL_PASS: Zidzatha. Funsani CHW kuti akupatseni malangizo.
ASK_CHW: Funsani CHW kapena yang'anani gawo la Tsatiri Pakubadwa Mwana.
START_N_B_P_S: Yambani tsopano! Pitani kugawo la Ndondomeko ya Pakubadwa Mwana.
C_CHW_S: Lumikizanani ndi CHW kuti ayang'anire zizindikiro za pre-eclampsia.
T_T_F_P: Yang'anani nthawi zomwe zimachitika. Ngati zili nthawi zonse, lumikizanani ndi wopereka.
P_P_H_B: Chonde konzekerani chikwama chanu cha chipatala sabatali.
